file_insights.purpose: Track subtask completion progress from 2 to 3 completed tasks, increment session number from 3 to 4, update timestamp
Integrate LandingPage as public root route with revised redirect logic

patterns_discovered.description: App uses a ProtectedRoute wrapper component to guard authenticated pages (Dashboard, Projects, etc) while allowing public access to root and login paths
Routes are ordered with public pages first, protected routes second, and wildcard catch-all last; fallback redirects to root instead of login to accommodate new LandingPage
Component imports are ordered with router imports first, Layout component second, then page components in logical order

gotchas_discovered.description: Root path '/' changed from dashboard redirect (protected) to direct LandingPage rendering (public), fundamentally altering UX flow
gotchas_discovered.impact: Users now see landing page before login instead of being redirected to dashboard; requires careful handling of authenticated user scenarios

gotchas_discovered.description: Catch-all route changed from navigating to '/login' to navigating to '/'; must ensure this doesn't create redirect loops if LandingPage itself has routing issues
gotchas_discovered.impact: Invalid routes now direct to LandingPage instead of login - behavior depends on whether LandingPage has internal routing

gotchas_discovered.description: LandingPage route lacks visible authentication state checking in this commit; unclear if authenticated users are redirected away from landing page
gotchas_discovered.impact: Authenticated users may be stuck on landing page if no automatic redirect to dashboard exists in LandingPage component

approach_outcome.task_completed: Add LandingPage route to App.tsx routing configuration
key_changes: Added new root route: <Route path="/" element={<LandingPage />} />
Removed previous root route redirect to dashboard
Updated wildcard fallback redirect from '/login' to '/'

recommendations.recommendation: Verify LandingPage component exists and exports correctly from './pages/LandingPage'
recommendations.rationale: Import will fail silently at runtime if file is missing or default export is absent

recommendations.recommendation: Implement redirect logic in LandingPage to automatically navigate authenticated users to dashboard
recommendations.rationale: Current routing allows authenticated users to land on LandingPage; should auto-redirect to dashboard for better UX

recommendations.recommendation: Test redirect loop scenarios: anonymous user -> LandingPage, invalid route -> '/', LandingPage behavior for authenticated users
recommendations.rationale: Circular redirects can occur if LandingPage routing is not properly handled

recommendations.recommendation: Document the new routing structure and access control rules (public vs protected routes) in project documentation
recommendations.rationale: Root path behavior fundamentally changed; future developers need clear understanding of new flow
